test-repo¶

This repo is for testing out the functionality of using sphinx to create documentation.

Steps:¶

  1. Install poetry

  2. poetry shell

  3. Run sphinx-quickstart to set up the basic structure

  4. Add extension for parsing markdown poetry add myst-parser

  5. Add myst_parser as an extension in conf.py

  6. Add a random readme file called license.md

  7. Edit index.rst file like below:

.. toctree::
   :maxdepth: 2

   license.md

  1. run make html again

  2. open index.html to see the documentation being built

  3. see example here

test-repo
